

```{r}
taiwan.plot <- fortify(Taiwan)
```

```{r}
tpemap <- ggplot() +
    geom_polygon(data = taiwan.plot[taiwan.plot$id == 11,], 
                 aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), 
                 color = "black", size = 0.25) +
    coord_map() 
print(tpemap)
```
